# circle

R client package for the Circle CI REST API

## What works

- [x] Get env vars
- [x] Delete env vars

- [x] Set ssh key
- [x] Get ssh key
- [x] Delete ssh key

- [x] Get pipelines
- [x] Get workflows
- [x] Get builds

- [x] Trigger build
- [x] Retry build

# What doesn't work

- [ ] Set env vars
